background_description: The background consists of a dry, rocky terrain with various sized pebbles and stones mixed with sandy dirt. The stones are predominantly grey, beige, brown, and off-white, with rough and irregular textures. Some areas show finer gravel and sand, with scattered small, colorful mineral flecks.
camouflage_type: Color blending / Pattern matching / Shape disruption
explanation: The grasshopper exhibits excellent camouflage by perfectly matching the color palette of the rocky and sandy environment, predominantly shades of grey, beige, and light brown. Its rough, segmented body texture closely mimics the irregular surfaces and angular shapes of the surrounding pebbles and stones. This combination results in a low contrast difference, making it very difficult to distinguish the organism from the background, effectively disrupting its outline and allowing it to blend seamlessly into the gravel.
